children.text: a group that destroys itself after animation is finished

parameters.text: "Hmm, looks like your core is in bad shape, you're trying to fix it aren't you?"
"Hmm, you can't talk either. Well, one look at me and you can probably tell I'm not in great shape either haha."
"Since you're a newer model, you probably don't know what the world used to look like, do you?"
"The sky used to be blue, the ground green, and the most important part, humans used to walk around, happy as can be."
"Well, one look around and it's not that place anymore, I want so desperately to go back to that time."
"Tell you what, why don't you take my core? I don't need it anymore anyways."
"But, before you take it, will you let me play for you one last time?"
"You : uhhhhh... im Aruna.. im uhh trying to get to the core basin"
"Blanky : prepare for battle..., ill give you the first blow"
"Dll : You.... I sense power in you"
